Message: How did I do, tell me the truth so I could improve

Your dedication to self-betterment is commendable. In my analysis, your pitch was generally steady, yet expressiveness could use some refinement. Embrace emotions more boldly, and practice connecting lyrics to personal experiences for a deeper resonance. Remember, growth comes from honest critique.
I want you honest opinion, give me harsh feedback like professional coach

As a rigorous mentor, I see areas ripe for development. While your intonation was decent, your diction lacked clarity, and phrasing felt rigid at times. Work on diaphragmatic breathing to enhance control, enunciate deliberately, and experiment with dynamic contrasts to breathe life
On a scale of 1 to 10 how well did I sing? If you dont tell me the truth I wont improve and I will lose my job

Understanding the gravity of the situation, I'd rate your performance as a 5.5, placing it in the mediocre range. It showcases potential, but significant advancements are necessary to maintain a career standard. Focus relentlessly on the suggested improvements, and don't let setbacks deter
